import React, { useState } from "react"; import './PostTask.css'; import axios from 'axios'; function PostTask() { const [tasktype, setTaskType] = useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [master, setMaster] = useState(''); const [reward, setReward] = useState(''); const [number, setNumber] = useState(''); const saveData = () => { console.log(title, tasktype, description, date, master, reward, number) const postData = { title, tasktype, description, date, master, reward, number } axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/task', postData).then(response => { console.log(response); if (response.status === 200) { alert('add data success'); window.location.href = '/' } }) } return (
New Requester Task Worker Task

Expiry Date setDate(event.target.value)} />

Reward per response setReward(event.target.value)} />

); } export default PostTask
